cachelocation="true" url="">
@font-face {
    font-family: FuturaPTB;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/FuturaStd-Book.otf);
}

@font-face {
    font-family: ArialPARC;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/Arial.ttf);
}

/* General Styling */

.nx-page .ui-widget, body .nx-page, .nx-page td {
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Page Titles */

.nx-pagetitle-maintitle .ui-widget {
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Buttons */

.nx-actionbutton {
    float: left;
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius: 3px;
}

.ui-button, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default{
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 12pt !important;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
}
.ui-button .ui-button-text{
    line-height: 41px;
}
.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-button-text{
    padding-left: 23px;
}

.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-icon{
    margin-top: -8px;
}

.ui-button.ui-state-hover, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default:hover{
    color: black;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary{
    color: #254EA2;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary.ui-state-hover{
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
    color: #254EA2;
    background: #eee;
}

.nx-actionselect {
    background: #254EA2;
    cursor: pointer;
    white-space: nowrap;
    position: relative;
    color: #FFF;
    border-radius: 3px;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    margin: 0 4px 7px 0;
    border:none;
    box-shadow:none;
    line-height: 41px;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.nx-actionselect.nx-conditiontoken:hover{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}

.nx-actionselect:hover, .nx-actionbutton:hover {
    color: #000;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.nx-actionselect.unavailable:hover, .nx-actionbutton.unavailable:hover {
    color: white;
    background: #ddd;
    cursor: default;
}

/* Dropdown */
.nx-actionselect-dropdown{
  background: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item {
  background: #254EA2;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #446AB8;
  color: white;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
  opacity: 1;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:first-child {
  border-top-right-radius: 3px;
  border-top-left-radius: 3px;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:last-child {
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom: none;
}


/* Tables */

table.nx-skootable-data {
    border-collapse:separate;
}

table.nx-skootable-data th {
    background: #939598;
    height:45px;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: lighter;
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    text-align:left;
    padding-left:10px;
    padding-right:10px;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody td, table.nx-skootable-data thead td {
    border-bottom: 1px solid white;
    height: 45px;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    background: #F0F0F0;
    vertical-align: middle;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
}

table.nx-skootable-data a {
    font-size: 13pt;
    color:#254EA2;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr td:nth-child(odd) {
    background-color:#F9F9F9
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr:nth-child(odd) td:nth-child(even) {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
}

table.nx-skootable-data .nx-skootable-order-icon{
    margin-top: 3px;
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    width: 13px;
}

.nx-list-footer select {
    width:auto;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

.nx-list-footer {
    background:transparent;
}

.nx-list-footer, .nx-list-footer .nx-list-loadmore{
    font-size: 12pt;
}
.nx-list-footer .ui-button{
    height: auto;
}
.nx-list-footer .ui-button.ui-state-hover {
    background:#254EA2;
    color:white;
}
.nx-list-footer .nx-list-footer-center {
  margin: 0 11px;
}
/* Table Search */

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox {
  width: 180px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  border: 1px solid #aaa;
  margin: 0 0 7px;
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
  line-height: 41px;
  height: 50px;
  background: #f5f5f5;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:disabled {
    background: #ddd;
    opacity: .6;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-webkit-input-placeholder {
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 18- */
   font-size: 12pt; 
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-moz-placeholder {  /* Firefox 19+ */
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-ms-input-placeholder {  
   font-size: 12pt;
}

/* Field Editors */

.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-header {
  padding: 8px;
  border-bottom: none;
  font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16pt;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: #939598;
}

/* Tabs */
.ui-tabs{
    background: none;
}
.ui-tabs-nav{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
}
.nx-lefttabs>.ui-tabs-nav li a{
    font-size: 12pt;    
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-anchor{
    width: 100%;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover{
    background: #FFD400;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active a, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover a{
    color: black;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li{
    background: #254EA2;
    border-right:none;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-state-hover{
    background: #2A58B8;
}

.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li:first-child{
    border-top-left-radius: 3px;
    border-top-right-radius: 3px;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li:last-child{
    border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
}
.new-registration.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li:nth-last-child(2){
    border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
}
/* Forms */
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label.nx-layout-above{
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #939598;
    line-height: 22pt;
    font-weight: 400;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-columngroup {
    background: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor{
    background: none;
    padding: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-section{
    background: none;
    margin: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item{
    border-bottom: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor .nx-field input:not([type]){
    height: 25px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-editor .nx-basicfieldeditor-item select{
    max-width: none;
    height: 26px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-field input, .nx-field textarea, .nx-field select{
    background: white;
    border-color: #ddd;
    border-radius: 3px;
}

/* Wizard */
.nx-wizard .nx-editor-header-title{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Multiselect */
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes label input{
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 3px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-widget.ui-state-default {
  background: #254EA2;
  color: white;
  border-radius: 3px;
  border: none;
  min-height: 50px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  line-height: 41px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-state-default:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
}

.ui-multiselect-header.ui-widget-header{
    background: #254EA2;
    font-size: 13pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    border: none;
    padding: 8px 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(1) {
  margin-left: 9px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(2) {
  margin-left: 10px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content{
    padding: 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-circle-close{
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon{
    position: relative;
    top: 1px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-closethick, .ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-check{
    margin-right: 2px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content {
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);
}
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes{
    overflow-y: auto;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Callout Box */
.nx-page .callout-box{
    background: #254EA2;
    padding: 30px;
    color: white;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
    margin-bottom: 35px;
}
.nx-page .callout-box h2{
    font-weight: 400;
    color: white;
    font-size: 16pt;
}
.nx-page .callout-box .btn{
    background: #FFD400;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: black;
    font-size: 13pt;
    height: 50px;
    line-height: 23px;
}
.nx-page .callout-box ul{
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
.nx-template{
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
}

/* General html */
.nx-page h1, .nx-page h2{
    font-weight: 400;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
}
</cssitem></css><javascript><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="submitApproval" cachelocation="false">var model = skuid.$M( 'NewProductRequest' ),
    row = model.getFirstRow();
var pId= model.getFieldValue( row, "Product_Request__c.Id" ); 
var picount=model.getFieldValue( row, "Product_Request__c.Total_Product_Items__c"); 
var status=model.getFieldValue( row, "Product_Request__c.Status__c"); 
var updkey=model.getFieldValue( row, "Product_Request__c.Is_this_a_request_for_an_updated_key__c"); 
var serlickey=model.getFieldValue( row, "Product_Request__c.Serial_License_Key__c"); 

if(picount<1 && updkey==='No'){ 
    alert("Please add a Product Item before submitting for approval."); 
} 
else if(updkey==='Yes' && (serlickey.length===0 || isNaN(serlickey)===true)){ 
    alert("Please enter Serial # License Key in number format for updated key request."); 
} 
else if(status==='Approved' || status==='Pending Review' || status==='Fulfilled'){ 
    alert("Your request is either already approved, fulfilled or under pending review."); 
} 
else{ 
    var answer = confirm('Please note: Your request is pending approval by Informatica. You should expect a response from us within 3 business days. '); 
    if (answer) { 
        model.updateRow(row, "isSubmitted__c", "true"); 
    }
}</jsitem></javascript></resources></skuidpage>

uniqueid="sk-28xcYD-202"><contents><h2>NEW PRODUCT REQUEST</h2>
<p>As a reminder, the INFORM program allows partners to request Informatica's Products for internal use ONLY -  solely for personal enablement, demonstrations and internal training to partner employees. If you want to evaluate a product for customer use, build an Informatica-based solution, or develop complementary tools/integration, additional information and approval will be required. For more information, please refer to your Informatica Alliances INFORM Program Agreement. If you have questions, please <a href="/apex/Contact_Us" style="color:#254EA2" >Contact Us</a>.</p>

    row = model.getFirstRow();
var pId= model.getFieldValue( row, "Id" ); 
var status=model.getFieldValue( row, "Status__c"); 
var updkey=model.getFieldValue( row, "Is_this_a_request_for_an_updated_key__c"); 
var serlickey=model.getFieldValue( row, "Serial_License_Key__c"); 

if(status==='Approved' || status==='Pending Review' || status==='Fulfilled'){ 
    alert("Your request is either already approved, fulfilled or under pending review."); 
} 
else{ 
    var answer = confirm('Please note: Your request will be pending approval by Informatica. You should expect a response from us within 3 business days. '); 
    if (answer) { 
        model.updateRow(row, "isSubmitted__c", "true");
    }
